shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams.

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams, including the streams of users who join the channel after this method is called.
After successfully calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams, including those who join the channel after the method is called.

After this method is called successfully, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams, including streams from users who join the channel after this method is called.
After successfully calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams, including those who join the channel after this method is called.
section.note: By default, the SDK subscribes to all remote users' video streams when joining a channel. To change this behavior, set autoSubscribeVideo to when calling to join the channel. This disables subscription to all users' video streams upon joining. If you call or after this method, the latter takes effect.

By default, the SDK subscribes to all remote users' video streams upon joining the channel. To change this behavior, set autoSubscribeVideo to when calling . If or is called after this method, the latter will take effect.

By default, the SDK subscribes to all remote users' video streams when joining a channel. To change this behavior, you can set autoSubscribeVideo to when calling , so that no video streams are subscribed to upon joining. If you call or after this method, the later call takes effect.

By default, the SDK subscribes to all remote users' video streams when joining a channel. To change this behavior, you can set autoSubscribeVideo to when calling to join the channel, which disables video stream subscription at join time. If you call or after this method, the latter call takes effect.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called after joining a channel.
This method must be called after joining a channel.
You must call this method after joining a channel.
This method must be called after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
: Stop subscribing to all users' video streams.
: (Default) Subscribe to all users' video streams.

: Stop subscribing to all users' video streams.
: (Default) Subscribe to all users' video streams.

Whether to stop subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
: Stop subscribing to all users' video streams.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
